Package org.factcenter.qilin.primitives

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Cipher
    This interface represents generic public-key encryption (or commitment).
    Cipher.PK<C,P,R>
    Represents the public key of a cipher.
    Cipher.SK<C,P,R>
    Represents the secret key of a cipher.
    CollisionResistantHash<C,P>
    A collision-resistant hash.
    CyclicGroup<G>
    Represents a cyclic group (one that is generated by a single element).
    Group<G>
    Represents an algebraic Group with elements of a generic type.
    Homomorphic<C,P,R>
    Represents a Homomorphic cryptosystem or commitment scheme.
    NonInteractiveCommitment
    Represents a non-interactive commitment scheme.
    NonInteractiveCommitment.Committer<C,E,R>
    Represents the Committer in a non-interactive commitment scheme.
    NonInteractiveCommitment.Verifier<C,E,R>
    Represents the Verifier in a non-interactive commitment scheme.
    PseudorandomGenerator
    A pseudorandom generator.
    RandomOracle
    Represents a Random Oracle.
    Sampler<G>
    Represents a sampleable distribution.
    StreamingRandomOracle
    Represents a Random Oracle; this interface can be more efficient than RandomOracle when the oracle will be queried on different points in a stream.
    TrapdoorNonInteractiveCommitment
    Represents a non-interactive commitment scheme with a trapdoor.
    TrapdoorNonInteractiveCommitment.EquivocatingCommitter<C,E,R>
    Represents a commitment-scheme committer with a trapdoor that breaks the commitment's binding property.
    TrapdoorNonInteractiveCommitment.RevealingVerifier<C,E,R>
    Represents a commitment-scheme verifier with a trapdoor that breaks the commitment's hiding property.
